text: Mastercutor is the eleventh album by German heavy metal band U.D.O., released on May 18, 2007. The album title, according to frontman Udo Dirkschneider, is a shortened version of "master executor". ==Track listing== ==Credits== *Udo Dirkschneider: vocals *Stefan Kaufmann: guitar *Igor Gianola: guitar *Fitty Wienhold: bass *Francesco Jovino: drums ==References== Category:2007 albums Category:U.D.O. albums Category:AFM Records albums
title: Mastercutor
